original_text: ‘People of Israel, put up signs along the roads, so that you know the way to go. Remember the road that you travelled on when you went away from your land. Now return, my special people, Israel. Return to your cities that you had to leave. ‘People of Israel, put up signs along the roads, so that you know the way to go. Remember the road that you travelled on when you went away from your land. Now return, my special people, Israel. Return to your cities that you had to leave. ‘People of Israel, put up signs along the roads, so that you know the way to go. Remember the road that you travelled on when you went away from your land. Now return, my special people, Israel. Return to your cities that you had to leave. ‘People of Israel, put up signs along the roads, so that you know the way to go. Remember the road that you travelled on when you went away from your land. Now return, my special people, Israel. Return to your cities that you had to leave. ‘People of Israel, put up signs along the roads,
korean_text: 처녀 이스라엘아 너의 이정표를 세우며 너의 푯말을 만들고 큰 길 곧 네가 전에 가던 길을 마음에 두라 돌아오라 네 성읍들로 돌아오라

sentences.original_text: People of Israel, put up signs along the roads
so that you know the way to go
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 너희가 갈 길을 알게 하라

sentences.original_text: Remember the road that you travelled on
when you went away from your land
Now return, my special people, Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 돌아오라, 나의 특별한 백성 이스라엘아
